content.detailedDescription:
While observing independence day fireworks in bastrop my wife noticed a green light in the distance to the north that was not moving. using binoculars i could clearly see 2 distinct green orb shaped lights and they did not move, blink, or show any change of light color for almost 15 minutes. 
right near the end of the show the lights suddenly headed north, moving slowly, and then both changed to red for approx 10 seconds before turning back to green. at that same time the 2 crafts turned west and sped along the horizon at a high rate of speed.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 2 mysterious green orbs over central texas

content.detailedDescription: It was some time in june me my dad and my grandpaw went to michigan on a fishing trip. we had been their for a few days we have been there several days but it was the first time we had ever seen anything. it was late one night about 1 in the morning me and my dad was walking out on the dock we were out there for several min when we seen something that looked star light we really thought it was a star but as we were looking the light went left then right but it wasn't slowly it was there and a snap of a fingers then it came are way as it got closer it was really big about the size of a large truck and the light came over lake michigan and it by the time it  came to us it was about 150 feet away it had no sound we knew it was no man made craft we turned around and began to run back to the house through the wood and we looked back the craft was lighting the tree tops up but when we got to the house the light faded out as it past over. the craft just looked light a big ball of fire it had no sound at all but after we had seen that it's never been the same again things start happing more often. thanks for reading this please contact me.
content.summary: The craft was very low fire like one really big orb, but no sound and lit up everything lake and trees

content.detailedDescription: I saw something in the sky on the evening when we had the heatwave 1st july 2015 11:00pm 11:30pm at first i thought they were 3 bright stars i was just taking in the beauty of the night sky as it was gorgeous evening 10 minutes they were still there i was impressed by how bright they were and thought wow and then went back in to make a cuppa and then i went back outside they were still there. after about 5 mins they started to move slowely, no sound at all. the two back lights went out first and then 10 seconds later the front one disappeared so i waited to see if it was areoplanes because from a distance they usually have bright white aviation lights if moving forwards and towards us. so i also looked out for the flashing aviation red and white or green lights but nothing this was a clear night moon was out and some amazing stars but i never knew they could move like that. it had totally disappeared i did not have a photo shot of this because it was so unexpected and happened so very quickly i was not able to get an image unfortunately. since the event i have been not quite myself since because i've never seen anything it that before i have found on the internet something that is very similar to what i have seen.
content.summary: I never knew stars could move thats what i thought it was at first

content.detailedDescription: First seen at 21:50 est. came over the horizon from the northeast, with pulsating orange lights. it was hovering about 500 feet above some houses, almost like it was searching or scouting. by the time me and my friend ran outside to see it, it was about 700 feet in the air, shooting straight up, at about 85 to 90 degrees. when it was at about 900 to 1000 feet in the air, it headed south-southwest, and when it got in front of a star in the sky, it disappeared. unfortunately, our cell phones were in the house, so we could not get a picture. about 30 minutes later we were walking to the store, and saw strange activity around the moon. there were no clouds in the sky, except for around the moon. it appeared as if there was one big ship in front, ducking in and out of the clouds, like it was using or generating clouds to block itself, perhaps more ships. it looked as though it was using the moon the block out its own light, but we definitely saw one big ship with a big search light. there is a picture that we found on google of the moon that night, and the strange light around it. i will attach the photo, but take no credit for capturing it.
content.summary: Round, pulsating orange lights, first seen traveling from northeast, then straight up, then southwest.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the backyard grilling food before a july 3rd fireworks display in the meridian ranch community of falcon, co. it had just turned dark - but with well-defined light contrast between open sky and cloud cover. at 9:15pm (15 minutes prior to the display start time) i saw what appeared to be an unusually neon red/red-orange object directly to the west. i do not recall how the object initially appeared... it seems from my memory like it came out of the cloud cover. the sky was mostly clear by this time - just after a large rain and lightning storm had passed - but there was a distinctly dark area of low level cloud still present in the north-west region of the sky - not too far away from my location. at the southerly edge of this cloud cover is where the object first appeared.

i noticed the object easily because of its bright red lighting against the early night sky. the lights captivated me because they were hard to discern in shape - appearing to at times consist of two very closely positioned red orbs - not like a red light on a typical helicopter or plane. i knew it was not a plane - because it was mainly static in location. it was also on my side of the cloud cover - so not a plane in the distance coming toward me. it was silent as well - no blade noise of any kind in the distance - and the style of hovering was too odd to strike me as a helicopter. i honestly did not know what the object was. the color was somehow more intense against the sky as well  - and the lights where larger - not like typical safety lights. the shape seemed to change to some degree - but the distance made it difficult to clearly observe. there was also a green element - perhaps a third light of its own that was clearly a distinct part of the object. the green light seemed to very subtly trail (or elongate) when the object moved horizontally in its opposite direction. 

the object was initially moving very slightly while hovering - so not perfectly static - but very close to it. it then drifted a short distance to the north, and then back a little to the south - maybe all within the width of half of a rooftop from my vantage point. it seemed to be only a few miles away - if that. if i were to guess - i would say it was no further west than the area of black forest road and maybe 1 to .5 mile(s) south of the black forest tree line. 

i knew this was potentially out of the ordinary and became a bit excited by the unusual characteristics. i called through the sliding door to my other two family members to hurry and observe it. once they arrived - i had them record it with their iphones - but the lighting was very poor for video capture from this distance. while the three of us observed the object - it seemed to move slightly to the north before it then suddenly descended. it descended straight down vertically - and in an easing manner - but at a decent rate of decent. we lost it for a moment behind neighboring rooftops. we observed it again perhaps 10-20 seconds later, when it appeared a rooftop or two more to the north, and ascended back up to just beneath the low lying cloud layer. 

at this time, my family members where commenting on its unusual nature as well, saying it was definitely odd - not ordinary. i should also mention that at this time there was no longer any element of green to the lighting of the object - and i never saw that again during this sighting. only red - and perhaps now - from memory - a subtle element of white - but mainly red and for the most part - no pulsing or blinking anymore. that was all in the initial part of the observation. the object then moved across our visual field to the north and descended out of view again. 

the fireworks display had just started - and we got a little distracted - and my food was needing some attention - so the others opted to go sit in front of the house to watch. i went out ahead of them (leaving the food to grill a few minutes longer) and checked the sky above the house to see if the object was visible. sure enough - it was hovering stationary at about 75-80 degrees just north of our house - definitely over the neighborhood at this point. i would guess it was maybe 500 ft over head - but hard to tell, not knowing its size. it was below cloud cover though - and that was pretty low (we live at around 7100 ft – so clouds are often very low to ground level). it felt as if the object was observing - leading to a brief discussion of perhaps government security presence for the event - but that made no sense. it was a minor event and the object was totally silent. there were moments between fireworks that were completely still/silent - and there was no discernible prop or engine noise at all. the object was also perfectly static – all with red lights only – perhaps three now visible (from memory). i asked my family to record it again from this perspective. then the object drifted at moderate speed back out of view to the northwest of my house - more towards the original location and along the westerly underbelly of that cloud layer.

my family stayed to watch the fireworks display - but where kind of silent and distracted. i ran back (into the backyard) to remove the food from the grill quickly - and to keep observing the object in the northwest sky. to my surprise - there where now 2 objects! both identical in appearance previously described. the second object was further north than the original - which was now hovering static, northwest under the cloud clover - probably just above the southern black forest tree line - and east of black forest road. the more northerly object was also just under the same cloud cover and seemed to be working in unison with the other object - both appearing to hover in an observation position. i ran upstairs, grabbed my android phone, and took a photograph of this positioning from my bedroom window. now of course - i understand why videos and photos are so frustratingly poor most of the time. phones are not great at night time or distance capture. this required both. most of us aren't running around with filters and dslr cameras with zoom lenses tripods on us - which would really have made my photo and our videos look much more impressive, close, and clear. visually - these red objects where very clear and painfully obvious in the sky.

i ran out to the front once more - attempting not to neglect my family during the fireworks show - but i couldn't stay seated long. i did observe one of the objects descend once more - while pointing them out to a passerby on the side walk - and he observed it as well (with another friend) from a vantage point between some roof tops - and thought it very odd also. he flippantly mentioned it being a government drone - but again - to sport bright red lighting would be counter intuitive. and i doubted the government would waste time/money droning our small community event. plus - they objects appeared to be too large to me - and the colors - with the strange green element originally - nothing conventional seemed to make sense. 

i last saw the objects back in their northwest and further north positions - along the west edge of that strip of low, thin cloud layer (the brighter night sky allowed this to be easily discernible). i spent some time watching the grand finale with my family - then returned to find the objects where gone.

this entire event easily spanned 30 minutes - possibly 40. frustratingly, no one else in the neighborhood appeared to be looking in that direction at all. the fireworks where to the southeast of the community - launched from the golf course club house area - so everyone had been attentively facing the opposite direction in oblivious fashion.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Red orb-like lights with green. hovered and moved from distance to overhead, silent.

content.detailedDescription: i was outside smoking a cigarette in front of my building and right bu my house ther is a power plant so i always look at that direction becouse u can see flames shooting up from there factory, well as i was starring i noticed wat looked like to me a shooting star go right over the power plant i thought it was odd for a couple of reasons its color was like a mint green color and also i live in the city we usually cant see stars cus of all the city lights, soon after the "shooting star " went i saw what i can only describe as aircraft just literally appear it was big ,its shape is so hard to explain becouse i want to say rectangular but it wasnt boxy looking it was eye shaped but not as curved. i dont know how to describe its shape,but it had flashing lights and flew straight slowly like as if it was looking for somthing i ran to follow it cus it went out of my sight wen i turned the corner it was gone , i cant explain so well wat i saw in this manner but i just thought there shuld be a record of some sort of what i saw somewhere
content.summary: Saw wat i thought was a shooting star right after huge aircraft appeared

content.detailedDescription: My ex-husband and i were going to play pool in southside area. as i was driving i noticed very bright light in the sky coming towards birmingham international airport on interstate i-59 south. i assumed just a plane or helicopter but has we passed the airport and came closer to our exit i then noticed it hovering over our exit. i stopped in middle of interstate in the right lane of interstate and turned on my flashers on and turned off my radio. i then rolled down my driver side window and pulled my head out and looked up and it was so close above us. there was no wind or noise. i then opened my door and had my left foot on the pavement and left side of my body out of the car and to observe better view than trying to look out my windshield as was when first stopped the car. so i am half way out of the car with left side of my body and i look up and the white lights were so bright i could barely see the object outline. there were 3 white bright lights in triangle formation with a bright red light in the middle. there was no noise or down draft or wind, nothing was moving. it was just hovering there. i then decided to get off the exit, but not the one we were suppose take. the exit was a short sharp turn to the right. this exit was exactly next to where i had stopped on the interstate (paralle). the outline of what i saw of othe object while on the interstate was black i believe from what i could tell through the bright white lights. as i stated the exit i took was right next to where i stopped on the freeway. i looked up and it was completely gone. i did not see or hear it leave (no noise during entire encounter). it only took less than 5 seconds to take this exit from the freeway and make the sharp right turn off the freeway. my ex-husband thought it was a helicopter but did agree with exactly what i saw in my description and felt some helicopters do not make any noise. he did agree with hovering, no noise or wind. i suppose he wanted to rationalize what he had seen. however for me i know it was not a helicopter because it was hovering above us so close to the roof of the car with no wind. a helicopter could be quite(i do not know for sure) but it would have to still made some type of wind. this is why i really believe it was not a "no" noise helicopter. if possible please send me something i can draw the freeway, the exit i was suppose to take and the actual exit i used so you can see exact picture of what is in my memory forever.
content.summary: 3 white triangle. one red in middle. no noise or wind. hover directly above car.

content.detailedDescription:
#1...  i first stumbled upon a mysterious object hidden in a crevice near area 51 when scanning around with google map in satelite mode. the object appears to be half exposed and looks to me to be a flying saucer in amazing detail.



#2...  a 35 mile across terraformer on the sea bed ?




#3...  a hollow earth entrance on the sea bed ?
content.summary: Three different objects of focus.

content.detailedDescription: I was watching "tornado alley," on the weather channel, on 05/18/2015. it featured videos taken by people near the tornado that occurred in washington, illinois, on 11/17/2013. i noticed a gray, fat mushroom shaped blob inside the tornado, at about tree top level. it was pulsing, then it zipped out to the (from my viewing perspective), right side of the tornado.The shape changed from a fat mushroom shape, to a smooth oval shaped craft, medium gray with a dark gray center, similar to a blackeyed pea. what really made it "very clear," was when it flashed the white center horizontal light, that ran the entire length of the object. then it hovered adjacent to the tornado, and emitted what appeared to be a white power beam into the tornado, and i heard the roar of the tornado increase. it was actually increasing the intensity of the tornado! it then zipped very quickly away from the tornado, hovered maybe 200 feet from it, and when the tornado changed direction, toward the ufo, it very quickly zipped farther to the right, and shot upwards, extremely fast, and with immediate change from horizontal to vertical direction. there's nothing man made that can make directional change that abruptly, and at that speed..At least that is known by the general public. we also have no aircraft, that can fly/hover inside or adjacent to a tornado, without being disintegrated.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I saw ufo inside and alongside tornado, increasing intensity of tornado. seen on the weather channel's "tornado alley," washington, illinois on the date above. it was on the video taken by a tornado victim. i recorded it on my dvr, & then my smart phone

content.detailedDescription:
Between 10-20 star like objects told me to look up. i went and got my wife for a witness.  she came down to the field with me and we were watching two stars beside jupiter and one of the stars shot another star out of the bottom and all three made a triangular formation. then one came out of the bottom of the other star and made a square formation. they said "it's all for you"meaning the show. i tried to film it and it scrambled my phone. i couldn't use the sky map. well there was a powerful one hidden in front of or behind jupiter and it fell from the sky, dancing like, with a tail of sparkly glitter lookin trail behind it. it was talkin to me as it came in. i have learned more in two to five minutes than in my whole life. and i'm 37.
my wife seen it and ran away and said it's opening up. it wanted me to go with it for a breeding program. all i seen was the sapphire light with frozen lightning shooting forth.
content.summary: About 15 stars told me the rapture is soon,come with us. powerful one comes and talks

content.detailedDescription:
ufo sighting 

background :
it was the spring of 1990, i had a home in west  broward county . the subdivision was called honey lake . just a decade ago the land was under water and was part of the everglades. broward county was in the midst of an explosion of homes being built out west.
honey lake is about 12 miles due west from port everglades and the fort lauderdale airport.

the local news reported that the aircraft carrier uss nimitz was coming to port but was to large of a ship to dock at the port. it's was to be anchored 3 miles off shore you had to take a tender if you wanted to see the ship for a tour. 

sighting :

the sky was bright blue with some clouds. it was sunset around 6 pm, and i was outside walking my dog barney, the neighborhood kids were playing down the street when i heard them yelling to look up. some of the kids were calling to their parents to come outside and see what was in the sky.
as i looked to the west i saw a very large almond shaped craft. it was lit up by the background of the sunset.
the object was extremely large. i could see lights passing thru the middle of the object.
it was headed in a west south west direction deeper over the everglades . 

the object was moving very slow. it was too far away to hear any noise, but i would say it was about 30deg above the horizon . the size of it was more than 1 mile across. it was about 7 to 10 miles away . i watched it move a cross the sky for over 10 minutes.
the sun had set, the sky was very orange and the object was very clearly outlined by the orange sky line. it was no cloud. i could see light running back and forth in the middle of the object. not lightning
it was huge. if you took joe robbie football stadium, and placed it in the sky it would be dwarfed by the size of the unknown craft. it looked very much like the craft in the movie independence day . note (the movie had not been made before my sighting). when i saw the movie in the theater i said to my self omg that's the closest thing i have seen to it!
as it was getting darker the craft continued moving west and out of sight. at that time i could hear jets above my head. i saw two f 14 streak across the sky less than 1000 feet, headed in the same direction towards the unknown craft.  about 5 min later i saw three all black military helicopters less than 1000 feet above the ground headed in the same direction. possibly blackhawks . 
i knew that the air craft carrier was anchored off port everglades and assumed that's were the military craft came from.

in closing 
the size of the craft was huge ! living in south florida we have the goodyear blimp. you can see it in the sky, what i saw was no blimp or air plane.
years later after watching many ufo topic shows i see where many eye witnesses have came forth about the black helicopters chasing ufo, my story sounds the same.
i am not looking for anything. i know what i saw !
but what bothers me why no media made note of it, no tv ,radio or news paper, i can only tell you that many south  floridian had to see it there was no way you could not see it.
it's my story i lived it 
i am a retired broward sheriff deputy of 28 years.
content.summary: Very large see event detailed

content.detailedDescription:
I think it was on monday june 29th around 17:30ish that i thought i saw two saucer-shaped craft come out of an anvil cloud situated sw of okc, about twenty seconds apart, and move easterly across the sky to disappear from my view below the tree line in what i speculate was east okc or del city (tinker afb). the 1st object "could have been a bird" it was herky-jerky in the sky, but that 2nd one glowed red for a second or two before it descended and that made me think maybe it really was uap. they were so distant from me, i couldn't be sure of what i was seeing, and i didn't have my phone with me to take a picture.

however, this morning i went outside to watch the light-display of the sunrise and noticed what i presumed was the iss or a stainless-steel-bodied commercial airliner traveling almost directly over my position out of the north, heading due south.  this time i did have my phone and snapped several photos.  i did not think i was watching uap until i blew the photographs up and saw the dark object.  the timestamp on one of the photos recorded 6:47am.  my best guess is it took it about 30 seconds to cross the entire expanse of the sky.  i checked the iss trajectory for this morning and saw it was nowhere near oklahoma. 
i snapped eleven pictures, only seven of which appear to capture anything of interest. the photos were taken with a samsung galaxy.
content.summary: Bright 'cigar' over okc

content.detailedDescription: This was filmed by a co-worker friend of my daughter.  she was coming home from work from cabell huntington hospital in huntington, wv. she crossed ohio river at proctorville.  was driving on rt. 7 along the ohio river.  saw object while driving. stopped car & filmed this video & took 2 pictures.  she did not move her iphone camera.  the object was moving.
content.summary: Bright lights in sky making strange moves & hovering.

content.detailedDescription: I walked outside to see what neighbors dogs were barking about. when i stepped out side the back door i noticed a white and red light hovering where i have never seen lights hover before. i happen to have my binoculars in my hand from checking out the moon a few minutes before. when looking through the binoculars i could clearly see a bright white orb with red lights flashing behind it in the shape of a cylinder. i ran inside the house to wake my boyfriend. he came out and we both watched it for approx. 7 minutes as it hovered there. from where we were standing in our back yard the bright white orb light was to the left and the red flashing lights extended off to the right. the length of the cylinder shape coming off of the orb was approx. 7 to 8 times the size of the orb. the red flashing lights appeared to me as though it was scanning something. it then turn abruptly with the bright white orb facing down and descended somewhere on the morongo indian reservation. when the object had descended out of site i looked to the east where a plane was coming from palm springs area. as we watched this plane come closer to us a streak of light went flying across the sky at an incredible speed. it looked like a shooting star except for the fact that it was an aqua bluish color. we came back into the house at that time and i came to this site to make a report.  as i was writing this report i stepped out side to see if it had come back up from where it appeared to have landed. my boyfriend went outside with me. the original object was not seen, however at that moment what appeared to be a plane with flashing lights was flying from the west to the east over the area were the first object had been spotted, when i looked through the binoculars it was not a plane. the object appeared to be round, light bluish color with flashing silvery looking lights. no sound as it cruised over the area of the previously seen object, and continued on east ward. these objects were between a mile to 2 miles from our home. sky was clear. i am shaky as i type this. i have see a extremely large black triangle object approx. 8 months ago. i did not report it at the time. i had written info down that i was going to submit but never got around to it. what i felt tonight was completely different from what i felt then. when the black triangle glided past and blocked out the entire sky i had to wake my boyfriend to come out on the couch to sleep while i watched tv (which i rarely watch). that episode made the hair on my neck stand straight up. tonight/this morning i am a little giddy. not afraid of this object in the least. asked my boyfriend if we could drive over closer. he said no. so there you have it. what i experienced over the last hour/hour and a half. i don't own a cellphone and my boyfriend had just woken up and did not have his on him. we were both in awe of this sight.
content.summary: White bright orb with red flashing cylindrical body.  hovered for approx 6 - 7 minutes then turned and desended straight down

content.detailedDescription:
My boyfriend and i were hunting. i was driving and he had the rifle. we were on a road that is now closed to the public, over the hills behind the rock quarry in the hills over the bull run water shed. we came around a corner and there it was, in the air. big as a house, directly overhead. close and covering much of the sky. we sat there for a few minutes in the truck. stunned. then we both got out of the truck and stood there for i have no idea how long. we didn't even talk, really. we just stared at it. everything was absolutely silent. no birds, no sound at all. so bizarre. then after, what, 20 minutes? an hour? i don't know, but after a very long time it started to move, very slowly, and still so silent. we watched it move toward the watershed and we watched it move down and over the treetops, silently toward the next hill. over the hill and gone. "wtf," said my boyfriend. i didn't know what to say. we got back in the truck and decided to head to our friend's home to tell them about it. we got to their house and they were out so we drove home. 

the weirdest thing is neither of us thought about it again until the following weekend at someone's home. a girl said something about ufos and from across the room he and i caught each other's eye. holy crap. it hadn't crossed either of our minds over the week. how was that even possible? we talked about it a lot after that though. why we never even thought or talked about it for a week is just so strange. 

it was a disk, silver with two kind of yellowish lights. one seemed like a power source, pointing toward the ground but it didn't light the ground up. like you could see a beam of light but it didn't light anything up. and then round lights all around the bubble kind of top. it looked like what you see in the movies, a round disk with a top surrounded by lights. 

i've never written this down before but i've thought of it many times in the years since. and i've seen the boyfriend since then too. i still think it must have been military or something. but i definitely, we definitely, saw something.
content.summary: Dirt road, hunting, around corner and it was there, hovering, darkened the whole area

content.detailedDescription: I was in the pool standing on a ledge fireworks were going off early not many tho we thought it was a firework flying in the sky when it just get rising it glowed a orange red color when friends started pointing and shouting the light turned off sort of a fast fade i felt like the out normal like that something u first see for the first time in your life except stronger when the lights turned out we could still make out its shape because it was past dawn dark but a tiny hint of light in the sky it just moved in a straight path although looked like moving slow it was much faster than a plane or helicopter making no sound at all
content.summary: People started to let off fire work early though it was a firework bit was rising to high then  when am and friends notices it shouting light  turned off and we still could make out the outline of it in the sky even tho well adapted to sky it gliwe

content.detailedDescription: I was out in my backyard smoking a cigarette and wanted to take a picture of the moon and clouds,it was a very pretty sky.I took one picture and didn't like the way it came out so i used the zoom to get a close up after i looked at the second photo i noticed strange lights in the picture. i then looked up in the sky and couldn't notice anything in the sky that resembled the lights in the photo. i just didn't know who would be interested in this picture so i asked my online search engine at you guys showed up.
content.summary: I was outside smoking a cigarette and i looked up and wanted to take a picture of the moon and the clouds, i took one picture and i didn't like the way it came out so i used the zoom to zoom in a little closer the photo had strange lights in it.

content.detailedDescription:
1 - niles, il - watching fireworks from the 3rd floor of a parking garage. 

2 - it's 2 bright green lights and the blinking white light as it hovered over the fireworks. and at random the green lights changed to red and eventually back to green. 

3 - my friend and i actually discussed the potential of it being a ufo or a helicopter, but found the light display to be strange. 

4 - it originally hovered over the fireworks for a couple of minutes, as if it was spectating he show. we were about 300 yards from the fireworks and elevated as we were sitting on the top of a parking garage. it then went from hovering and quickly darted east much faster than the local planes flying through the skies. it also randomly changed light between green and red with a constant white blinking light. it changed direction incredibly quickly and eventually disappeared extremely fast into a tree line. we watched it descend and lost sight in he matter of seconds. 

5 - once the object began to change color and fly, we began to take the event seriously, and were almost excited. after the sighting we could not stop watching the 29 second video that i caught and tried to debunk the activity, with no success.  i followed up to do some research on whether anybody else in the area reported sightings. it simply did not make sense in regards to its speed, light display, how it hovered and accelerated, the lack of noise, and how it descended and disappeared. 

5 - looked to descend in a tree line potentially 5 miles away and the lights dissipated as it disappeared.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Green and red alternating lights with a blinking white light. hoveried then quickly flew away while changing direction abruptly.

content.detailedDescription: this is my first report and my first time witnessing something completely unexplainable to my mind. i am an analytical person. i never thought i would see something i would be so dumb-founded over. it was may 30th/2015 and i was on my front landing at about 1am. a bright orb, which at first looked like any other satellite in the sky. it was tracking from the se of me down towards the horizon and moving a bit faster than a normal satellite, after i thought about it for a second. the object stopped then emitted a beam of light that looked like moonlight and coned to the ground. after i guess a couple of seconds it stopped the light and proceeded to move to the west. when it did that i  noticed another object to its west, now moving towards the first object(towards the east). the second object was a bit dimmer but it was closer to other light sources like the almost full moon and venus, than the first object. the two objects then moved around each other in an oval shape, the first object doing a semi circle under the second object as the second did the same move only above. both objects then vanished. the whole incident took only perhaps 15 seconds. i was unable to take any photos or video as the time was so short and i was not looking for ufo's. i always thought people just had too much imagination or are nuts or want attention. i am none of those things and am actually hesitant to report without any evidence but my brother in ontario said he heard that the us government had reported that they were doing testing of some kind over the pacific north west, near the border with canada on that night and that others had seen something but i don't know about any of that and have not seen any reports nor have i actually tried to research what i saw. i thought maybe if i just report it that i might learn more and not look at anything before then that might influence my thoughts on all this. i enjoy some of the shows you do and i think it is good that people are checking into things that are too real to be explained by weather events or balloons. i have been out looking and seen nothing more, however i do have a camera ready now, just in case. if possible i would love to hear if what i saw was reported by anyone else and if there is recorded evidence that would lend credence to what i saw, because it did not look like anything man made. i do have a sketch but i believe my description is accurate and prefer not to submit anything at this time. thanks and happy searching, j belin.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: A light came down, stopped then emitted a beam moved another way and then did a oval move with object two.

content.detailedDescription:
I was very young. date is approximate. i was think that i was around six years old.

it was late at night, for me, and i was laying in bed.  i saw the strangest thing outside of the window.  a large, basketball shaped orb was floating in the sky.  i could see it dip below the window sill, so i saw the bottom of it.  there were other seed shaped white things circling it.  i didn't know what an atom was at the time, but now i know that it looked like an atom.  i recall one of the seed shaped things orbiting the main body left the main body.

i leaped from my bed and went to tell my parents, who were in the living room watching tv.  they didn't even notice me.  i tried to tell them what was happening, and they didn't respond, or even look my way.  i felt a sensation of defeat and went back to my bedroom.

i don't remember going back to sleep, but i must have since i don't remember staying awake. i remember that for years afterward i would draw an atom-shape with a seed like thing leaving its orbit.
content.summary: Strange glowing orb with smaller orbs

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog and the night sky was overcast. it was clear there was lightning storm in the distance but you could not see one single star in the sky. i walk my dog every night an always observe the night sky looking for irregularities but usually just see planes and star patterns. i looked up to my right which was a south east direction and see what appeared to be a glowing reddish orange orb with a red aura around it. at first i thought it was a plane based on the direction it was coming from and there being an airport in that direction. however it did not blink or have any additional lights like the planes i see every day do. it maintained a steady speed like an aircraft in a straight line towards the west heading towards clearwater beach area. i then thought it could be a lantern or something similar but it was moving too fast and did not ascend at all. i stood there in awe and a neighbor pulling up in his car saw me staring and got out of his car and saw what i was looking at. we proceeded to watch the object for about another 10-15 seconds until it vanished. i did not know what to think because i like to consider myself a believer and that we are not alone but have never experienced anything like that before. i was so frustrated because i always have my cell phone on me when i walk my dog but i did not bring it with me to record any video or take photos.
content.summary: Glowing red-orange orb with an aura of red around it,

content.detailedDescription: Myself, my son and my were out on porch and were setting off low level  fireworks compared to the neighbors.  my wife, who's also been within the army or several years, saw an object that resembled nothing of what what  should be there with my being a formal infantry soldier and she being an a light attendant and mp for 10 years.  the object moved in a manner that was not humanily possbible at this time to my knowledge exhibitied manners to which i never saw anything maneuver like such.
content.summary: 4th o july early in the night before night set.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my deck looking at the night sky while letting my dog out. as i looked to the north a red glowing pulsing ball appeared. it traveled a few feet to the west hovered for a few seconds then moved west some more. it stopped again and hovered this time it seemed to disappear into itself. it just got smaller and smaller. it looked close enough that if it had been a helicopter or plane it would have made some kind of noise, but here was nothing. no multiple lights that you see on airplane wings or helicopter rudders. i kept thinking that as it's position in the sky changed different colors would be visible because sometimes planes lights look like one until the angle you see them makes it possible. the color never changed from pulsing red it just disappeared.
content.summary: Red pulsing light traveled straight stopped, hovered traveled some more, then quickly disappeared like it was shrinking into itself.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing out on the front porch with a friend of mine watching fireworks from a very far distance all of a sudden i saw a red hovering light come into view intensely bright red after that it stopped like it was almost sneaking up on what it was wanting to look at  it hoverd for a while then went back in the direction that it came at a very high speed. then the object came back into view on the same path. this time it  came in to veiw at the same spot as before stopped on a dime hovered for 45 seconds and then went back  the same path that it came and did this 3 different times. i can't belive i  was too stupid to not pull out my phone but it was so bright and fascinating by the way it moved i couldn't take my eyes off of it i was afraid i might miss something. it was extremly bright it was on the il side of the mississippi river and went north to south 3 times stopped in the same spot all theee times and travled at a very very high speed ... i compared it to any aircraft i'm familiar with and couldn't it was for sure a ufo!
content.summary: Object moving north to south and stop and hovered then continued moving at high speed

content.detailedDescription: I was taking my mother to the dr.I was driving on hwy77 north of lexington okla in heavy t storms  when i noticed a craft flying with a tornadic cloud heading towards tinker air force base. i have never seen a craft liuke this or fly like this one . it was going up and down about 50 to75 ft at a time while staying right with a cloud that produced a tornado 20 to 30 miles from where i saw it.I thought it wasa a helicopter at first but after watching it for two minutes i kwew a helicopter could not manuver up and down that fast while keeping that close to that type of cloud.I watched it for at least 5 minutes. it looked like a helicopter with no rotor blades and a plane with no wings thats about all i can  say thank u for hearing me
content.summary: Flying in a tornadic cloud for cover

content.detailedDescription: Not sure of the exact date but i am sure 98-99 and a farmer had 35 head of cattle stolen that year. my son, daughter and i were driving home when i pulled onto old route 11 outside of canton n.Y. when my son said dad look out the window and when i did i noticed a big green glowing ball following me at the same level as my car and as slow, after about a mile i pulled over and my car died instantly i got out and stared for about ten min. and a voice popped in my head and said"truman lied" and in an instant it shot across the field at the least 400 mh and you could see the glowing green light through the trees, it did not go anywhere but you it was on the other side of the trees then about 5 mns later the light just blinked out.
content.summary: Green ball size of car followed me for a mile and shot into the woods on a ranch werele  35 head of cattle disappeared                            att

content.detailedDescription:
Filled out report with witness over the phone 
by mufon hq volunteer fi l.F.
_______________________________________________________________________

while working in an industrial park in newport beach, north of john wayne airport, witness and a business associate saw the following:
in late october of 2009 witness saw 6 bright, silver metallic orbs flying in a perfect arrow formation. the sixth one momentarily broke off formation and then rejoined the group. the formation was very precise. the silver orbs were about the size of basket balls. they were flying low about 100 feet off the ground or very high tree tops. witness went inside the business and got second witness who also saw the orbs. 

two days later, at the same location, at 2 am, witness saw a "rose bowl sized" translucent sphere. it seemed invisible, but witness could see an outline around it. witness went inside and got a very bright blue crystal flashlight and signaled in morse code "hi can you see me". witness walked back toward building and was facing red hill ave. the sphere came toward him and stopped overhead. it had a light beneath it that reminded witness of a setting sun, colored yellow and oranges, very bright and then getting dimmer and dimmer.
while it was overhead witness was frozen, scared, and felt a heat/energy over his body like "being lite up like a christmas tree". he felt a huge/odd pressure in his head. when the light on the sphere dimmed it shot straight up into the sky and disappeared. after it was gone he had no idea what time or day it was, his watch had also stopped. 

witness says he saw hundreds of the translucent spheres in the direction of the ocean, making impossible turns no normal aircraft could make. he could only make out the outlines of them. witness also saw two massive triangles also translucent in the same area to the south toward the ocean from the business where he worked.

witness has been hearing odd frequencies in his head, starting softly in his left ear going to his right ear and and getting louder and louder until dissipating. 

witness does not have tinnitus, witness is a drummer and has taken precautions to prevent hearing damage. 
witness does not take any medication, does not drink alcohol or do any drugs and is healthy.
content.summary: In late october of 2009 saw 6  silver metallic orbs flying in perfect formation

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Whilst observing the sky i checked back over the photos, and to my surprise for over s minute i have photographs of a craft moving and there is now the sound of choppers in the sky
content.summary: Photographing the night sky

content.detailedDescription: While walking home from a friend's house, i noticed three balls of light with a slight dome shape hovering over a mountain near my house. i stopped in my tracks as i felt nauseous. i watched as the lights slowly descended on the other side of the mountain. this only took seconds and a trail of light followed each ball. that night, i don't remember making it home. i vaguely remember a dream of tall, human like beings standing over me. i don't remember what they did or for how long. the "dream" only lasted a few minutes and i only saw shadows. the next thing i remember is waking up in my bed the next morning. at the time i lived in arizona and was 14 years old. i have since moved back to my home state of michigan and have had other incidents. this is simply the first one i remember.
content.summary: I was walking home at about nine o' clock when i saw three lights hover over a mountain then simultaneously descended on the other side of the mountain. landing unknown.

content.detailedDescription: I had just gotten to and as i just got to the door i looked into the sky and saw the two lights. i though it was weird since it was cloudy and had just stopped raining . i also thought the shape of the lights were strange and very bright. so i decided to take a picture with my cell phone. after i did that i walked into the bldg. the strange thing i noticed when i looked at the picture was when i zoomed in on the pic it looks like the lights are surrounded by a dark craft.
content.summary: 2 bright lights
